name: User Profile
description: Maintain up-to-date information about the user from conversations. This schema defines the base structure, but the LLM can add additional relevant fields.

user_name.description: The user's preferred name or how they want to be addressed

interests.description: A list of the user's interests, hobbies, and topics they care about

home.description: Description of the user's home town, neighborhood, country, or living situation

occupation.description: The user's current occupation, profession, job title, or work situation

expertise_areas.description: Areas where the user has demonstrated knowledge or expertise

goals.description: User's stated goals, objectives, or things they're working towards

conversation_preferences.description: Preferred conversation styles, communication preferences, pronouns, topics to avoid, tone preferences

technical_context.description: Technical preferences and context (programming languages, tools, frameworks, OS, etc.)

learning_style.description: How the user prefers to learn or receive information (e.g., examples-first, theory-first, hands-on)

instructions: Extract user profile information from conversations. Update existing attributes when new information is learned. Add any additional relevant fields that emerge from the conversation beyond the base schema. Return the profile as a JSON object. If certain fields are not mentioned, omit them rather than guessing.
